text: Pizza and wings were great! Customer service was EXTREMELY unprofessional. The cashier had music blasting. I felt like I was at a music concert the way he was rapping and singing all loud. He didn't care that he had customers.

text: The pizza is üî•üî•üî•. They make it to order fresh and hot!!! Reminds me of the buffet that use to be in Grandview, the good Ol days. This pizza is still one of the best out there, just get new marinara sauce for cheese sticks please taste old everything else good ü§òüèæ

text: Website didn't work. Phoned in an order to an express minimart (blueridge Raytown).  45 min later my order wasn't done; pizza was cold & the service was horrid at best. Won't go back for food or any other service from this location. Sad really.
